insert into qt_financial_user (id, userCode, userName, userMobile, userEmail, userStatus, userLevel, tureName, password, userCID, isCIDValid, isLockedOut, avatarUrl, inviteUser, createdAt ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usermobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useremail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{turename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usercid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iscidvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{islockedout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inviteuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update qt_financial_user set userCode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userMobile = #{usermobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userEmail = #{useremail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userStatus = #{userstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userLevel = #{userlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tureName = #{turename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userCID = #{usercid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isCIDValid = #{iscidvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isLockedOut = #{islockedout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatarUrl = #{avatarurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inviteUser = #{inviteuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdAt = #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, userCode, userName, userMobile, userEmail, userStatus, userLevel, tureName, password, userCID, isCIDValid, isLockedOut, avatarUrl, inviteUser, createdAt from qt_financial_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, userCode, userName, userMobile, userEmail, userStatus, userLevel, tureName, password, userCID, isCIDValid, isLockedOut, avatarUrl, inviteUser, createdAt from qt_financial_user
